title: Nam Mangosteen Thailand
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Was vegetarian but reported to have added meat, Aug 2015. Stall within a food market. Offers noodle soups, sweet and sour veg and tofu, Chinese kale with tofu, green curry, and others. Owner speaks English so you could request to add or remove ingredients and make the dishes more or less spicy. Seating is shared within the food hall which has Wi-Fi. Located on the same main road as Wat Uppanantharam, but across the cross road in a south easterly direction. It is on the left hand side just past the dog leg to the left as you go down that street.
streetAddress: Tha Mueng Food Market, Tha Mueng Rd
